issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
After YARN-3983, we have an extensible ContainerAllocator which can be used by FiCaSchedulerApp to decide how to allocate resources.

While working on YARN-1651 (allocate resource to increase container), I found one thing in existing logic not flexible enough:
- ContainerAllocator decides what to allocate for a given node and priority: To support different kinds of resource allocation, for example, priority as weight / skip priority or not, etc. It's better to let ContainerAllocator to choose how to order pending resource requests.
fields.summary: FiCaSchedulerApp: ContainerAllocator should be able to choose how to order pending resource requests
